name: System Break (battlepowered)
description:
System Break is a Stealthy Microgame where you're a team of a Master Hacker and Thief, breaking into a money facility. This is my entry for the N8 2021 7-Day GameJam. This was also my first ever jam. And, kinda... actually.. my first ever videogame finished from start to end. I  hope you enjoy. I sure did making it. :D

===============CONTROLS===============

SPACE - Interact

MOUSE CLICK - SELECT

GLHF :D
